title: Student Grade Checker
description: Create a program that takes a student's score as input and outputs their corresponding grade based on the following conditions: score >= 90 (A), score >= 80 and score < 90 (B), score >= 70 and score < 80 (C), score >= 60 and score < 70 (D), score < 60 (F). The program should use conditional statements (if/else) to determine the grade.
